title: More options to customize
body: Tbh, let's all be honest here. The new HUD look weird, the map looks pretty bad and the announcer is a bit annoying. Most people won't agree with me here, but like the music option where players can customize the music of summoners rift, players should also be given the choice to pick which announcer and HUD or map we have. Please upvote for Riot to make changes in future patches.

replies.body: I can only say that I agree with you completely.
